prompt: Write email to my POC name garima vermas telling her that i am not able to come to office because of the personal reasons now write this in a profesional way.

sections.heading: Dear Garima Verma,
sections.content: I am writing to inform you that I will be unable to come to the office today, [Date], due to personal reasons.  I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

I will be checking emails periodically and will respond as soon as possible to urgent matters.  For any immediate assistance, please contact [Colleague's Name] at [Colleague's Email Address] or [Colleague's Phone Number].
I anticipate returning to the office on [Date of Return]. I will keep you updated if there are any changes to this plan.
